name: Brazuca Torrents
description: Fornece streams de filmes e series dublados de provedores de torrent. Suporta atualmente BluDV(+), Comando(+), EraiRaws(+), Keroseed(+), Lapumia(+), NyaaSi(+), OnePieceEx(+), Sukebei(+), VacaTorrent(+). (This addon was made based on Torrentio, all credits are to its creator).
